uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.model.data.filter

Class FilterPathParser<T extends DataObject>

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.model.data.filter.FilterPathParser<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of filter generated

    public class FilterPathParser<T extends DataObject>
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to parse a filter encoded as a path. Path elements can be AND(, OR(, ) which start and terminate grouping. or they can be of the form name=value. The value is parsed according to the rules of the corresponding form field then converted to filter using either one of the provided SQLMatchers or a SQLValueFilter.
    Author:
    spb
